overview: We all remember that hot Ex, the one we still fantasize about fucking. You can't even remember why the both of you broke up. All you remember was that it was so hot.  5 Bad Girls want to go back for one more ride, each one seeking out their prey and using their seductive power to get what they want.  Sex with their Ex.
tagline: We all remember that hot Ex, the one we still fantasize about fucking.
title: Sex With My Ex
